app.title: AI Art Photo Editor, Enhancer
app.description:
Everything you need to create images with AIÔºÅ

Try your anime version? Want to cartoon your own pictures? Want to create hug video? Curious about your future baby? Need to unblur, restore, or enhance any photo? AI Photo App can create stunning HD art photos with just one tap using the most advanced AI technology. Ready to try it now?

In addition, our app offers a variety of features, including face aging, AI filter, swap face, colorize, repair, retake and more. AI Photo app uses advanced AI technology to alter your photos and quickly generate artistic images in seconds. It is the ultimate tool for creating funny and amazing photos.

Key Features:
üì∑ AI Photo Enhance
Whether you are taking old photos with the camera or uploading any selfies or other photos in the gallery, you can turn blurry photos into gorgeous, clear high - definition photos with just one touch.

üé≠  AI Hug Video
With our advanced AI technology, you can upload two separate photos to create a realistic virtual hug video.

üë®üèª‚Äçü¶≥ Aging Video
How Will You Look When You're Old? AI Photo app is powered by AI technology for the best experience and accurate face aging. It is so much fun to oldify yourself with easy-to-use amazing old face filters, perfectly predicts the future for you.

üë∂ AI Future Baby Generator
Future Baby feature uses advanced AI technology to predict your future baby's face! Simply upload a photo of you and your partner, select the gender of your baby, and let the app work its magic. This feature is meant to be fun with your significant other, whether it's your girlfriend, boyfriend, wife, or husband. Don't take it seriously.

üåà AI Filter
AI Photo can turn your photos into stunning works of art with thousands of possible styles. Want to transform into your favorite superhero? Want your cat dressed up as an astronaut and fly to Mars? It's just one click away, create your AI filter photos instantly!

üí° Animate Photos
Breathe life into your still images with our Animate Photo feature. Transform your precious moments into living memories with just a few taps.  

üì∏  AI Retake Shot
AI retake uses cutting-edge AI technology to help you easily fix those imperfect moments. Fix your bad photos and open your closed eyes, generating multiple perfect photos with high quality.

üßë‚Äçüíº AI Photo Generator
AI Photo app quickly create images with cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Just upload your own photos to generate pictures in various artistic styles such as LinkedIn profile, business, old money, wedding, etc., your private photo gallery.

üë©üèº‚Äçü¶∞ AI Face Swap
AI Photo app will amaze you with the AI face changer. With advanced AI face-swapping technology, the face on your photo can be replaced on another photo and has realistic facial expressions and movements that really look like you. Paste your face onto your favorite beauties, witches and more, it must be fun to trick your friends with ultra-realistic AI face swap pictures!

ü¶πüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è AI Avatar Maker
Use the artificial intelligence magic in the AI Photo app to automatically generate artistic portraits, feel the fun of magical portraits, and get them with just one touch.

Advanced AI Photo app combines photos with AI Art. App transforms ordinary photos into mesmerizing works of art Experience the perfect combination of AI technology and AI Art with our AI Photo that allows you to effortlessly create captivating visuals that transcend traditional boundaries. Unleash your full creative potential with an unrivaled blend of AI photos and AI art in app. Experience the magic of AI Photo and the artistry of AI Art in tandem.

If got any questions, please email us to summerdaysc@outlook.com and we'll help you figure it out.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
Privacy Policy:https://coolsummerdev.com/artgenerator-privacy-policy
Term of Use:https://coolsummerdev.com/artgenerator-terms-of-use
Community Guidelines: https://coolsummerdev.com/community-guidelines

app.summary: Try anime version, cartoon yourself, generate AI hug & face aging video.

reviews.text: Amazing art but you only get 3 free trys even if you don't confirm or save it after that it's 40 bucks a year or 7 a month. I can't pay for that but I really do like the application it has many features. I'll change my rating if there's more options to use it more then 3 times. Untill then I will have to uninstall. I hope to see further improvement, this is a good application. Good job developers.
reviews.replyText: Dear user, thank you for your support, our application uses advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to generate unique and stunning works of art, we have optimized product performance, we are committed to continuously improving our application, thank you your support.

reviews.text: NOT RECOMMENDED! There is a great amount of adds, to the point of actually being annoying. I also have other AI apps, but they always display an add when they are generate something. This however, is throwing you an add the moment you open the app, the moment you pick an option, and of course the moment you want it to generate, and later download. So 4 ads for one sub par creation. No thanks. Uninstalled.
reviews.replyText: Dear user, thank you for your support, our application uses advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to generate unique and stunning works of art, we have optimized product performance, we are committed to continuously improving our application, thank you your support.

reviews.text: It takes so, so long for the damn picture to be turned into an ai. And the ads, don't even talk about them. It's so annoying that to create a picture, you need to see 5 whole ads. And an extra ad at the beginning and the end of the pic. You need to see an ad before checking how you ai is made. And every second, there is an message popping up, "go try pro". I don't want to even try pro. Please fix that and for now, uninstall.
reviews.replyText: Dear user, thank you for your support, our application uses advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to generate unique and stunning works of art, we have optimized product performance, we are committed to continuously improving our application, thank you your support.

reviews.text: It worked. Like really well. It's a shame at the price tho, I would prefer a one time payment full access to the app for the entirety of its lifetime - when the technology becomes redundant because of other advances. I hate subscribing to things, and if more app developers offered 1 time payment, I would spend a lot more money then I currently do.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your support, our application uses advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to generate unique and stunning artwork, we are committed to continuously improving our application, thank you for your support.

reviews.text: It gives you the option to upload photos, even watch an ad, to get a face swap for free... But then - no ads, pay for pro! So, the free version is useless, I immediately uninstalled it. If it said at the beginning that it could not be used in the free version, I would not have rated it... but because of user deception, it deserves 1 star. Seems like a scam to me
reviews.replyText: Dear user, thank you for your support, our application uses advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to generate unique and stunning works of art, we have optimized product performance, we are committed to continuously improving our application, thank you your support.

reviews.text: This app is mad decent. But you have to watch 100 ads to do anything significant of course. Like even pressing the back button on most things will forward you to ads, like come on guys that's a little ridiculous. Lighten it up a little bit
It's really dope..if you are looking for a better ap to edit your videos and photos this is he right app...it's really good but full of unnecessary ads

Have to say, out of all the ai apps I used or try to use. This is one of the best ones. Yes, there may be loads of ads or limitations on how much I can do in one day. But still able to create some rather than paying right away. That's something I appreciate. Most Ai apps don't give you a chance to create until you pay but this app allows you to create until your limit (unless you have pro). Plus the quality of the photos are outstanding as well. Keep up the great work!

These AI app developers definitely need help with these trying to create something really useful. This app in particularly just didn't work...click on bottons and nothing would happen. Seems that it's also a duplicate/ copy of Glam (ai photo editor).
reviews.replyText: Dear user, thank you for your support, our application uses advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to generate unique and stunning works of art, we have optimized product performance, we are committed to continuously improving our application, thank you your support.

reviews.text: Not reccommendedüëéüèªAfter watching a lot of Ads, in my first experience with this app, I discoverd that I had to purchase the hug effect. As that's the only reason I've downloaded this app and it does not tell you that the effect is not free, I immediately uninstalled it.

app.AIReview:
AI Art Photo Editor, Enhancer Review

Overview

AI Art Photo Editor, Enhancer is a mobile photography application leveraging artificial intelligence to provide users with a diverse range of creative image manipulation tools. Boasting over 13 million installs and a solid 4.3-star rating from 94,458 users, the app‚Äôs core promise ‚Äì generating stunning HD art photos with just one tap ‚Äì is immediately appealing. The application‚Äôs description focuses heavily on its ability to transform photos into anime styles, cartoon images, and even generate AI hug videos, alongside more traditional enhancement and restoration capabilities. The free price point adds to the initial attractiveness for users exploring AI-powered creative tools. This review will delve into the app's functionality, usability, and overall value proposition based on its features and user feedback.

Key Features

This application packs a considerable amount of functionality centered around AI-driven image manipulation. The core feature set can be categorized as follows:

  • AI Art Style Transformations: This is arguably the headline feature, allowing users to instantly convert their photos into various artistic styles including anime, cartoon, and painterly effects. The app claims to utilize ‚Äúadvanced AI technology‚Äù for this conversion, though the specifics aren‚Äôt detailed in the app itself.
  • Face Aging & Video Generation: Users can apply a face aging effect to themselves or others within their photos, creating surprisingly realistic results. The ability to generate ‚Äòhug‚Äô videos using existing images is a particularly unique and potentially engaging feature.
  • Swap Face: This feature enables users to replace faces in an image with another ‚Äì likely sourced from the app's library or uploaded by the user.
  • Colorize: The app offers automatic colorization for black and white photos, attempting to intelligently deduce appropriate colors based on the scene‚Äôs content.
  • Repair & Retake: These tools are designed to address common photo issues like blurry images or unwanted objects. The ‚ÄúRetake‚Äù function suggests a simplified method of correcting minor composition errors.
  • AI Filter Collection: A selection of pre-set AI filters is available for quick style adjustments.
  • HD Enhancement: Basic image enhancement tools, including brightness, contrast, saturation and sharpness controls are included.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to the app‚Äôs success:

  • Ease of Use: The ‚Äòone-tap‚Äô art transformation feature genuinely delivers on its promise. The interface is relatively intuitive, particularly for those unfamiliar with complex photo editing software.
  • Novelty and Fun: Features like face aging and hug video generation tap into current trends and offer a playful way to experiment with photos. These elements likely contribute significantly to the app's high install count.
  • Broad Appeal: The diverse range of features ‚Äì from simple enhancements to complex artistic conversions ‚Äì caters to a wide audience, including casual users and more serious photographers looking for creative tools.
  • Large User Base & Positive Rating: The impressive number of installs (13,737,484) coupled with the 4.3-star rating indicates significant user satisfaction and demonstrates that the app fulfills a genuine need or desire within its target market.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, AI Art Photo Editor, Enhancer has several areas where improvements could be made:

  • AI Quality Variability: User reviews frequently highlight inconsistencies in the quality of the AI art transformations. Some results are stunningly realistic and beautiful, while others appear artificial or distorted ‚Äì suggesting that the underlying AI engine needs refinement.
  • Limited Control Over Transformations: While ease of use is a strength, users often express a desire for greater control over the parameters driving the AI-powered effects. More granular controls would allow for more precise results.
  • Filter Library & Asset Quality: The app‚Äôs pre-set filters could benefit from an expanded library and higher quality assets. Some users report that filter images are low resolution or lack variety.
  • Transparency on AI Technology: The description mentions "advanced AI technology" without detailing the specific algorithms used. Providing a brief explanation would increase user confidence and allow for informed expectations.
  • Video Generation Stability: Feedback suggests occasional issues with the hug video generation, including awkward facial positioning or unnatural movements, requiring significant manual adjustment after creation.

User Experience

The overall user experience is generally positive, primarily due to the intuitive nature of many of its core features. The app‚Äôs interface is clean and uncluttered, making it easy to navigate between the various tools. However, the inconsistent quality of the AI transformations can be frustrating for users seeking polished results. The video generation functionality requires a significant amount of manual tweaking after creation, which detracts from the overall user experience. A smoother workflow and more predictable outcomes are crucial improvements.

Value for Money

As a free application with in-app purchases (details not readily available), AI Art Photo Editor, Enhancer offers considerable value to casual users. The core functionality ‚Äì including basic enhancements and style transformations ‚Äì is freely accessible. Users can unlock premium features or purchase additional assets through in-app purchases. The pricing model appears reasonable considering the breadth of offered features.

Conclusion

AI Art Photo Editor, Enhancer represents a compelling entry point into the world of AI-powered photo editing for both novice and experienced users. Its intuitive interface, coupled with innovative features like face aging and hug video generation, drives strong user engagement and contributes to its impressive install numbers. However, improvements in AI transformation quality, greater control over parameters, and stability within the video generation feature are crucial for solidifying its position as a top-tier app in this competitive landscape. Despite some inconsistencies, the app‚Äôs free price point and broad appeal make it a worthwhile download for anyone curious about exploring creative image manipulation with artificial intelligence.
